description:
Scotty’s favorite glue gun (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV
Red LED mini light (Affiliated Link): http://amzn.to/2yGCEbb
Minwax Polycrylic Water Based Protective Finish (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2h02UEd
Elmer's Glue-All Multi-Purpose Liquid Glue (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gAQi9P

Learn to make a kick ass killer tree encounter to terrorize your players in all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting tools and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Join DM Scotty's Facebook group for DM's Craft updates and info:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Become a DM's Craft Patron and help me bring more content to the community by joining Patreon. You will receive weekly exclusive DM Scotty content. https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Crow Hollow Cursed Tree Encounter for D&D (DM’s Craft #181)
